title: Expert Collaboration Process Based on Delphi Research for Learning Design Pattern Development

context.prior_knowledge: Practical experience in educational technology and science fields, basic learning design theory
context.additional_context: A blended learning program for science professionals, combining mobile-accessible microlearning modules with project-based assessments.

learning_goals: Learners can clearly distinguish and explain the core components of learning design patterns (attributes, components, process groups).
Learners can derive expert consensus across fields and validate learning design patterns by applying the Delphi research methodology.
Learners can develop science-domain learning design patterns suitable for mobile microlearning environments and apply them to real projects.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
